title: Buffer Zones Declared in New Bid to Contain African Swine Fever
text:
The government on Wednesday designated six areas as buffer zones in a bid to prevent African swine fever from spreading into southern regions.

According to the Ministry of Agriculture, Food and Rural Affairs, they are Dongducheon, Goyang, Pocheon, Yangju and Yeoncheon in Gyeonggi Province, and Cheorwon in Gangwon Province.

Movement of vehicles within the buffer zones will be strictly controlled, and all vehicles other than passenger cars will be restricted from entering any pig farm in the area.
description: Buffer Zones Declared in New Bid to Contain African Swine Fever
